Class CApplicationAmbassador

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.application.config.CApplicationAmbassador

public class CApplicationAmbassador extends Object implements Serializable
Main configuration of the MOSAIC Application simulator.

  • Field Details

    • messageCacheTime

      public long messageCacheTime
      To free some memory, use a time limit for cached V2XMessages. Default value is 30 seconds. Use 0 for an infinity cache. Unit: [ns].

    • encodePayloads

      public boolean encodePayloads
      If set to true, messages (e.g. CAMs, DENMs, or SPATMs) will be encoded into a byte array. If set to false, only there length is stored which may help to improve performance on large-scale scenarios. default: true

    • eventSchedulerThreads

      public int eventSchedulerThreads
      Number of threads used by the MultiThreadedEventScheduler. using more than 1 thread would result in undetermined behavior. Repeating the simulation could result in different simulation results, if some processed event uses the random number generator.

    • publicTransportConfiguration

      public CPublicTransportRouting publicTransportConfiguration
      Configuration options for route calculation via public transport. Requires paths to OSM and GTFS files.

    • navigationConfiguration

      public CApplicationAmbassador.CRoutingByType navigationConfiguration
      Class containing the information for the configuration of the Routing/Navigation (CentralNavigationComponent).

    • perceptionConfiguration

      public CPerception perceptionConfiguration
      Configuration for the perception backend used in the ApplicationSimulator to determine surrounding vehicles.
